harmony.description: Generate color harmony suggestions based on color theory

options.baseColor: Base color: hex (e.g., #FF0000) or dye name (e.g., Dalamud Red)
options.companionCount: Limit number of companions (optional - shows all by default)

match.description: Find the closest FFXIV dye to a given color

options.color: Color: hex (e.g., #FF0000) or dye name (e.g., Dalamud Red)

mixer.description: Generate a color gradient between two colors with intermediate dyes

options.startColor: Starting color: hex (e.g., #FF0000) or dye name
options.endColor: Ending color: hex (e.g., #0000FF) or dye name

info.description: Get information about a specific dye

options.excludeMetallic: Exclude dyes that begin with "Metallic" in their name
options.excludePastel: Exclude dyes that begin with "Pastel" in their name
options.excludeDark: Exclude dyes that begin with "Dark" in their name
options.excludeCosmic: Exclude dyes where Acquisition is "Cosmic Exploration" or "Cosmic Fortunes"
options.excludeExpensive: Exclude Pure White (itemID 13114) and Jet Black (itemID 13115)

options.dye1: First dye: hex (e.g., #FF0000) or dye name
options.dye2: Second dye: hex (e.g., #00FF00) or dye name
options.dye3: Third dye (optional): hex or dye name
options.dye4: Fourth dye (optional): hex or dye name

accessibility.description: Simulate how a dye appears with colorblindness

options.dye: Dye name or hex color (e.g., "Dalamud Red" or "#FF0000")

matchImage.description: Extract the dominant color from an image and find matching FFXIV dye

options.image: Image file to analyze (PNG, JPG, GIF, BMP, WebP)

matchImageHelp.description: Get tips and tricks for using the /match_image command

embeds.extractedUsingHistogram: Extracted using histogram analysis of dominant color

manual.title: XIV Dye Tools Bot - Command Manual
manual.welcome:
Welcome to the **XIV Dye Tools Discord Bot**! This bot brings powerful color analysis and dye matching tools from the web app directly to Discord.

All commands support **autocomplete** for dye names and parameters. Start typing to see suggestions!

tips.autocomplete: **Autocomplete:** Start typing dye names to see suggestions
tips.categoryExclusions: **Category Exclusions:** Facewear dyes are automatically hidden from most searches
tips.needHelp: **Need Help?** Use `/match_image_help` for image matching tips

manual.footer: Made with love for FFXIV glamour enthusiasts

match.title: /match
match.description:
**Find the closest FFXIV dye to a given color**
- **Parameters:**
  - `color` - Hex code (e.g., `#FF0000` or `FF0000`) or dye name
- **Example:** `/match color:#8B4513` or `/match color:Dalamud Red`
- Shows match quality, color distance, and acquisition info

matchImage.title: /match_image
matchImage.description:
**Extract dominant color from an image and find matching dye**
- **Parameters:**
  - `image` - Image file (PNG, JPG, GIF, BMP, WebP)
- **Example:** `/match_image image:[attach file]`
- Supports up to 8MB images
- **Tip:** See `/match_image_help` for best practices!

matchImageHelp.title: /match_image_help
matchImageHelp.description:
**Get tips for using /match_image effectively**
- Learn how image analysis works
- Tips for best results (cropping, lighting, etc.)
- Troubleshooting common issues

harmony.title: /harmony
harmony.description:
**Generate color harmony suggestions based on color theory**
- **Parameters:**
  - `base_color` - Hex code or dye name
  - `harmony_type` - Complementary, Triadic, Split-complementary, etc.
  - `companion_count` (optional) - Limit companions (1-3)
- **Example:** `/harmony base_color:Dalamud Red harmony_type:triadic`
- Shows color wheel visualization and companion dyes with deviance ratings

mixer.title: /mixer
mixer.description:
**Generate a color gradient between two colors**
- **Parameters:**
  - `start_color` - Hex code or dye name
  - `end_color` - Hex code or dye name
  - `steps` (optional) - Number of steps (2-10, default: 6)
- **Example:** `/mixer start_color:Snow White end_color:Soot Black steps:8`
- Shows gradient visualization with intermediate dyes

dye.title: /dye
dye.description:
**Dye lookup and information (has 4 subcommands)**

**`/dye info`** - Get detailed information about a specific dye
  - `dye_name` - Name of the dye
  - Shows color info, acquisition, and more

**`/dye search`** - Search for dyes by name
  - `query` - Search term
  - Returns matching dyes

**`/dye list`** - List all dyes in a category
  - `category` - Reds, Blues, Greens, etc.
  - Shows all dyes in that category

**`/dye random`** - Get random dye suggestions
  - `count` (optional) - Number of dyes (1-5, default: 1)
  - Great for inspiration!

comparison.title: /comparison
comparison.description:
**Compare multiple dyes side-by-side**
- **Parameters:**
  - `dye1`, `dye2` (required) - Hex codes or dye names
  - `dye3`, `dye4` (optional) - Additional dyes
- **Example:** `/comparison dye1:Dalamud Red dye2:Rolanberry Red`
- Shows comparison grid and pairwise color distances

accessibility.title: /accessibility
accessibility.description:
**Simulate how a dye appears with colorblindness**
- **Parameters:**
  - `dye` - Hex code or dye name
  - `vision_type` - Protanopia, Deuteranopia, or Tritanopia
- **Example:** `/accessibility dye:Dalamud Red vision_type:protanopia`
- Shows original vs simulated color with alternative suggestions

about.title: /about
about.description:
**Display information about this bot**
- Version, author, and social links
- Website and support information

manual.title: /manual
manual.description:
**Display this manual (you are here!)**
- Comprehensive command reference
- Usage examples and tips

stats.title: /stats
stats.description:
**Bot usage statistics** *(restricted access)*
- Command usage analytics
- Error tracking and uptime

about.title: About XIV Dye Tools Discord Bot
about.description: Powerful color analysis and dye matching tools for FFXIV, bringing the features of the XIV Dye Tools web application directly to Discord!
about.author: Author
about.supportMessage: If you find this bot useful, please consider supporting development on Patreon!
about.gettingStartedMessage:
Use `/manual` to see all available commands and how to use them.
Use `/match_image_help` for tips on getting the best results from image matching.
about.footer: Made with love for FFXIV glamour enthusiasts

matchImageHelp.title: How to Use /match_image
matchImageHelp.description: The `/match_image` command analyzes your uploaded image to find the dominant color and matches it to the closest FFXIV dye. Here are some tips to get the best results!
matchImageHelp.howItWorksContent:
**1. Image Analysis**
- The entire image is resized to 256x256 pixels
- A 4096-bin 3D color histogram is created
- The most frequently occurring color is extracted

**2. Dye Matching**
- The dominant color is compared to all FFXIV dyes
- Uses Euclidean distance in RGB color space
- Returns the closest matching dye
matchImageHelp.tipsContent:
**Crop Your Images**
- Focus on the specific armor piece or area you want to match
- Remove unnecessary UI elements and backgrounds
- The smaller the area, the more accurate the result

**Choose Good Lighting**
- Take screenshots in well-lit areas
- Avoid dark shadows or extreme highlights
- Midday lighting in-game works best

**Avoid Dark Backgrounds**
- Black or very dark backgrounds can skew results
- Use neutral, lighter backgrounds when possible
- The `/gpose` feature with custom backgrounds is great!
matchImageHelp.commonIssuesContent:
**"I got a dark color but my gear is bright!"**
-> Your background is likely dark. Crop the image to just your gear.

**"The match seems off"**
-> Multiple colors in the image? The algorithm picks the MOST common color.

**"Can I match a specific part?"**
-> Yes! Crop to that exact area before uploading.
matchImageHelp.proTipsContent:
- Use image editing software to crop before uploading
- For metallic/shiny gear, results may vary due to lighting
- If you know the hex code, use `/match` instead for exact results
- Compare multiple screenshots to see how lighting affects color
- Screenshot at 1920x1080 or higher for better quality
matchImageHelp.footer: XIV Dye Tools - Made with love for FFXIV glamour enthusiasts
matchImageHelp.goodExamplesContent:
- Cropped screenshot of a single chest piece
- Close-up of dyed armor with neutral background
- Screenshot taken in bright daylight area
- Image focused on the color you want to match
matchImageHelp.poorExamplesContent:
- Full-screen screenshot with lots of UI
- Character in a dark dungeon or cave
- Multiple armor pieces with different dyes
- Image dominated by background colors
matchImageHelp.whenToUseContent:
**Use `/match_image` when:**
- You have a screenshot and want to find the dye
- You're unsure of the exact color code
- You want to match a color from inspiration photos

**Use `/match` when:**
- You already know the hex color code
- You need more precise/exact results
- You're working with color swatches or design files
matchImageHelp.fileLimitsContent:
- Maximum size: {maxSize}MB
- Maximum dimensions: Auto-handled
- Processing time: ~1-3 seconds
matchImageHelp.matchQualityRatingsContent:
**Perfect** (0 distance)
**Excellent** (<10 distance)
**Good** (<25 distance)
**Fair** (<50 distance)
**Approximate** (>=50 distance)

*Lower distance = better match*
matchImageHelp.poweredBy: Powered by Sharp image processing library
